item.title: Project II: Diabetes Prediction
item.description: Overview Obtained dataset from Kaggle Visualized the dataset Performed label encoding Obtained the best performing ML model Measured model accuracy Link to Github repository Visit prediction website

item.title: Project I: Employee Retention Insights: Machine Learning Model Prediction
item.description: Overview Obtained and cleaned dataset from online database. Performed EDA on dataset. Obtained effective ML model. Performed prediction using ML model. Measured accuracy of model. Link to Github repository Visit prediction website

item.title: About
item.description: “If you give seed to a sower, you’ve given bread for food.” I am a BSc. Statistics graduate from the Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST). I hope to further my studies in Data Science. My areas of interests are Machine Learning, Artificial intelligence and Time Series Analysis. I hope to apply all these skills and contribute immensely to the health sector years to come.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I would love to hear from you. Platform URL LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/ronald-anim-20b281235 GitHub https://github.com/andaro07 Email animdarkoronald081@gmail.com
